site_name: Canada Water Master Plan, Land Bounded By Lowe Road (West) Redriff Road (South), Quebec Way (East)Surrey Quays Road And Canada Water Dock (North)And Sites At Roberts CloseSouthwarkLondon SE16
description: Details of Demolition Management Plan for "Zone L" pursuant to Schedule 23 Part 1 of the s106 Agreement associated with the Canada Water Masterplan (ref: 18/AP/1604): a hybrid planning permission for the comprehensive redevelopment of land including the Surrey Quays Shopping Centre, Surrey Quays Leisure Park, former Harmsworth Quays Printworks and land at Roberts Close for a range of land uses, new and improved public realm and associated infrastructure works.These details are also relevant for Condition 10 (Excluded Works) in relation to Zone L only.
